doc.title: Who's the Baddest
doc.plot: Ever wondered which fighting style is the best? Well here's your chance to find out. "Who's The Baddest" is the first interactive show that lets you choose two fighters that will battle one on one. Put your favorite martial artist up against each other to see who will come out on top. Hoosted by ICe-T, You can expect to see the likes of Chuck "The Ice Man" Liddell, MMA fighter going head to head with Renzo Gracie of the Legendary Gracie family. Viewers will get to vote on who they will see in the ring next. Get to see a sneak peak of how these fighters eat, train, and prepare for their battles. You wanted to know, now we will tell you - "Who's the Baddest."
